Introducing AutoMeet: Your Personal Meeting Assistant

Stay on top of your busy schedule and maximize productivity with AutoMeet, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to streamline your meeting experience. With AutoMeet, there's no need to constantly switch tabs or scramble to check when your next meeting is scheduled. Our powerful tool automatically alerts you about Zoom or Google Meetings on your calendar, ensuring you never miss an important session again.

Features:

Smart Meeting Alerts: AutoMeet intelligently scans your calendar for upcoming Zoom or Google Meetings and prompts a banner alert one minute before each session. Say goodbye to last-minute rushes and enjoy a stress-free meeting experience.

Meeting Summaries at a Glance: The banner alert not only notifies you about the upcoming meeting but also provides a concise summary of the event details. Get a quick overview of the meeting agenda, participants, and any additional notes right when you need it.

Convenient Meeting Access: With AutoMeet, joining your meetings is just a click away. Our extension conveniently includes a direct link to the meeting, allowing you to effortlessly connect without the hassle of searching for the meeting link in your calendar.

Current and Next Event List: Stay organized and informed with our intuitive popup window. AutoMeet displays a list of your current and upcoming events, providing you with a comprehensive overview of your schedule and helping you plan your day effectively.

Why Choose AutoMeet?

Boost Productivity: By eliminating the need to constantly switch tabs and search for meeting details, AutoMeet empowers you to stay focused on your work, ultimately enhancing your productivity.

Never Miss a Meeting: With AutoMeet's timely alerts and reminders, you can rest assured that you'll never miss an important meeting again. Be punctual, prepared, and make the most out of your valuable time.

Seamless Integration: AutoMeet seamlessly integrates with your existing calendar systems, supporting both Zoom and Google Meetings. It effortlessly syncs with your events, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Easy to Use: Designed with simplicity in mind, AutoMeet is user-friendly and requires no complex setup. Install the extension, grant necessary permissions, and let AutoMeet take care of the rest.

Experience the future of meeting productivity with AutoMeet. Download now and let our personal meeting assistant revolutionize the way you manage your schedule. Say goodbye to unnecessary stress and hello to seamless, well-organized meetings.
